docs.snippet: Nicaragua ranked first among Latin-American markets in credit and payments on export transactions with the United States during the first half of 1957, according to the survey reported over the week-end by the Foreign Credit Interchange Bureau.
docs.lead_paragraph: Nicaragua ranked first among Latin-American markets in credit and payments on export transactions with the United States during the first half of 1957, according to the survey reported over the week-end by the Foreign Credit Interchange Bureau.

headline.main: NICARAGUA TOPS IN CREDIT SURVEY; She Leads in Payment for U. S. Exports in Poll of Latin-American Lands

headline.main: Ship With 230 Is Sunk In Plate River Collision

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 28 (AP)--An official announcement tonight said ninety-four persons were missing in the sinking of an Argentine river craft following a collision with a United States freighter last night.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 28 (AP)--An official announcement tonight said ninety-four persons were missing in the sinking of an Argentine river craft following a collision with a United States freighter last night.

headline.main: 94 MISSING AS SHIP SINKS IN COLLISION

docs.snippet: BUENOS, AIRES, Aug. 29-- The Argentine Government today initiated an investigation into a shipping disaster that may have cost more than a hundred lives.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS, AIRES, Aug. 29-- The Argentine Government today initiated an investigation into a shipping disaster that may have cost more than a hundred lives.
docs.abstract: Argentina opens probe; holds freighter capt and some officers; crash seen worst Argentine maritime disaster in 75 yrs
